name: Cratejoy
headline: Cratejoy is the platform for subscriptions
description:
Cratejoy is the only all-in-one subscription box solution to help you launch, grow and scale your company. We provide the leading subscription box platform that allows you to launch and grow your business faster and more efficiently - no coding or plug-ins required.

We support over 2,500 companies on our platform and over 1 million subscribers on the Cratejoy Marketplace. Founded in 2014, Cratejoy is headquartered in Austin, TX

founders.name: Amir Elaguizy, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
CEO Cratejoy
CEO Fun Country
Chief Strategy Overmoon
CTO MarketZero (Acq. Zynga, 2011)

generated_description:
Cratejoy is a dynamic platform founded in 2014, based in Austin, Texas, focused entirely on subscription box businesses. Think of it as the go-to tool for anyone looking to launch, grow, and scale a subscription model without needing coding skills or additional plug-ins. Their mission? To simplify the subscription box experience for both sellers and customers alike.

Currently, Cratejoy supports over 2,500 companies and boasts a thriving community of more than 1 million subscribers through its marketplace. It’s a one-stop shop for unique subscription boxes that cater to virtually every interest—whether you’re into gourmet food, self-care, or niche hobbies.

Being a product of Y Combinator's Batch S13, Cratejoy stands out in the burgeoning subscription industry by providing not only a platform for sales but also a curated shopping experience for customers looking to discover new products. Their website, [cratejoy.com](http://cratejoy.com), is a vibrant marketplace showcasing a wide range of offerings grouped by category, helping shoppers find the perfect gift or treat for themselves.

With a team of about 51 people, Cratejoy is not just about selling boxes; it's about building a community where diverse brands can flourish and customers can connect with their interests and passions. They provide essential features for sellers, making it easy to manage subscriptions and facilitate growth.

If you're interested in starting your own subscription business, joining the ranks of Cratejoy’s sellers could be a great opportunity. Whether you’re a budding entrepreneur or just looking for your next favorite box to try, Cratejoy is a platform worth exploring.
